title: Emerald Dream Bridal Haaram - Exquisite Diamond and Gemstone Statement Necklace
materials: meticulously encrusted with brilliant-cut Diamonds (SI clarity
pear-shaped Emeralds of vibrant green hue
round Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant finish.
features: This breathtaking Haaram showcases intricate filigree work reminiscent of traditional South Indian jewelry designs. The cascading floral motifs are embellished with pave-set diamonds, creating a mesmerizing sparkle. The central Emerald pendant, surrounded by a diamond halo, adds a touch of regal elegance. Delicate pearl drops enhance the necklace's graceful movement.
occasions: especially for Muhurtham and reception events. Also suitable for grand celebrations
description: A truly captivating statement piece that seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern diamond-setting techniques. The use of high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and enduring value. The exquisite Emeralds symbolize prosperity and new beginnings, making this Haaram a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of regal elegance.
